amendment.description: Amendment requires the owners and operators of coal ash ponds to immediately clean up pollution from spills or disasters that involve coal ash waste.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 114-216 to preserve cleanup requirements in EPA's final coal ash rule to protect public health and ensure that air and groundwater pollution is addressed quickly and effectively.
